subnotes.content:
Young Children in Brief Separation, The Importance of Substitute Mothering

Scenes from two films: John and Jane aged 17 months, by James & Joyce Robertson

Tavistock Institute of Human Relations, London, N.W.3

For preservation reasons, and because copies exist elsewhere, viewing of this film is restricted. See: Series 5c (Special Formats, Audiovisual and digital material), Box 287, Folder 3631 to view the DVD copy of this film.
A DVD copy exists. See: Series 5c (Special Formats, Audiovisual and digital material), Box 287, Folder 3628 to view the DVD copy of this film.
Documentary footage of child in fostercare. Child interacts with parents and fostercare providers during and immediately following the period of fostercare.
